text: nam'mute spastamaya telivukal avarkk vayiccukelpikkappetumpeal, nam'me kantumuttumenn pratiksikkattavar parayum: ni itallatta oru khur'an keantu varikayea, itil bhedagati varuttukayea ceyyuka. (nabiye,) parayuka: enre svantam vakayayi at bhedagati ceyyuvan enikk patullatalla. enikk beadhanam nalkappetunnatine pinparruka matraman nan ceyyunnatâ€Œ. tirccayayum enre raksitavine nan dhikkarikkunna paksam bhayankaramaya oru divasatte siksa nan petikkunnu
